code: import React from'react';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Table=_ref=>{let{data,onSort,sortColumn,sortOrder}=_ref;const renderSortArrow=column=>{if(column===sortColumn){return sortOrder==='asc'?'▲':'▼';}return null;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"isp-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("th",{onClick:()=>onSort('name'),children:["ISP Name ",renderSortArrow('name')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("th",{onClick:()=>onSort('latency'),children:["Latency ",renderSortArrow('latency')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("th",{onClick:()=>onSort('downloadSpeed'),children:["Download Speed ",renderSortArrow('downloadSpeed')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("th",{onClick:()=>onSort('uploadSpeed'),children:["Upload Speed ",renderSortArrow('uploadSpeed')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("th",{onClick:()=>onSort('packetLoss'),children:["Packet Loss ",renderSortArrow('packetLoss')]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:data.map((isp,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:index<3?'top-isp':'',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:isp.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[isp.latency," ms"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[isp.downloadSpeed," Mbps"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[isp.uploadSpeed," Mbps"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[isp.packetLoss," %"]})]},index))})]});};export default Table;
